sources.title: Seven in Darkness
sources.description: Title: Seven in Darkness Summary: Based on the Leonard Bishop's novel Against Heaven's Hand. Seven blind people are on a plane on their way to a convention for the blind in Seattle. Due to bad weather, the plane crashes and only the seven blind people survive. Directed by: Michael Caffey Actors: Milton Berle, Bill Dyer, Nancy Fisher Production Company: Paramount Television Release Date: TV Movie 23 September 1969 Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 Based on the Leonard Bishop's novel Against Heaven's Hand. Seven blind people are on a plane on their way to a convention for the blind in Seattle. Due to bad weather, the plane crashes and only the seven blind people survive.

metadata.Plot: Based on the Leonard Bishop's novel Against Heaven's Hand. Seven blind people are on a plane on their way to a convention for the blind in Seattle. Due to bad weather, the plane crashes and only the seven blind people survive.
metadata.Actors: Milton Berle, Sean Garrison, Dina Merrill
